Key Match Events: Brennan Johnson scored the opening goal for Wales after 11 minutes
Harry Wilson doubled Wales's lead in the 29th minute
Logi Tomasson scored Iceland's first goal in the 69th minute
Iceland equalized through an own goal by Danny Ward in the 72nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy spoke about the learning experience for his team after the 45-minute struggle
Bellamy mentioned that the team's performance would be beneficial for future matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in freezing conditions in Reykjavik
Others: Danny Ward was recalled back by Craig Bellamy but his decision backfired
Brennan Johnson was booked and had to be substituted at halftime, missing the next match against Montenegro
